channel.title: Wielding in wrong spot- please look!

item.title: Wielding in wrong spot- please look!
item.dc:creator: @dun_dun_dun dun dun dun
item.description:
@dun_dun_dun wrote:

oh sure, here ya go

	[code]case 15557:
		itemDef.actions = new String[5];
		itemDef.actions[1] = "Wear";
		itemDef.femaleEquip1 = ; //Your female equip model
		itemDef.modelOffset1 = 5;
		itemDef.modelOffset2 = -12;
		itemDef.modelZoom = 976;
		itemDef.modelRotation2 = 51;
		itemDef.modelRotation1 = 510;
		itemDef.maleEquip1 = ; // Your male equip model 
		itemDef.modelID = ; // Your drop/inventory model number
		itemDef.name = "Arcane stream necklace";
		itemDef.description = "The energy from this necklace is unlike anything you have ever felt.".getBytes();
	break; [/code]

let me know if it doesnt work.

Read full topic
item.source: Wielding in wrong spot- please look!

item.title: Wielding in wrong spot- please look!
item.dc:creator: @ReDDD ReDDD
item.description:
@ReDDD wrote:

Hey guys iv added arcane stream but it wields in wepon spot instead of neacklass, what ints do i need to change, im not that experianced:
case 15557:
itemDef.itemActions = new String[5];
itemDef.itemActions[1] = “Wear”;
itemDef.modelOffset1 = 5;
itemDef.modelOffset2 = -12;
itemDef.modelZoom = 976;
itemDef.modelRotationY = 51;
itemDef.modelRotationX = 510;
itemDef.anInt200 = 56505;
itemDef.anInt165 = 55825;
itemDef.modelID = 56779;
itemDef.name = “Arcane stream necklace”;
itemDef.description = “The energy from this necklace is unlike anything you have ever felt.”.getBytes();
break;
Cheers ReD~

Read full topic
